entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Column mapping is changed, if table splitting is introduced. #32521
  • SQL Server: consider switching from COALESCE to ISNULL #32519
  • More Cosmos DB model customization options #32517

Closed

  • Unable to create a 'DbContext' of Type "". #32525
  • Is there any way to check whether provider supports transactions and certain isolation levels? #32524
  • EF Core ignores compiled model with PublishAot flag setted #32496
  • How to know the table and column name that is the problem in a foreign key exception in Entity Core? #32476
  • Contains to OPENJSON translation generates invalid SQL: Sintax error near '$' #32468
  • Query root of type 'TemporalAsOfQueryRootExpression' wasn't handled by provider code. This issue happens when using a provider specific method on a different provider where it is not supported. #32428
  • Interception point that gets the returned data after serialization #32418
  • Table splitting: Support mapping to the same table/column as another entity/entity's property. #32406
  • Compex types inconsistencies?: Record struct vs record for Requrired and ComplexType attribute, how to deal with Default values? #32404
  • Update on foreign key relation on a read only scenario #32402
  • [EF Core 8] InvalidCastException when adding Entity with nullable PK: Unable to cast object of type 'System.Func`3[System.Nullable`1[System.Int32],System.Nullable`1[System.Int32],System.Boolean]' to type 'System.Func`3[System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean]'. #32387
  • Problem updating an entity in relational database #32377
  • DbFunction definition returning nullable value type causes incorrect SQL to get generated #29585
    8.0.0
  • Does EF Core support collection expressions? #32475

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Revert behavior to throw when attempting to modify an unconstrained alternate key property #32523
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.x
  • Make proxies thread-safe accessing a navigation once loaded #32522
  • [release/8.0] Infer type mapping suitable for concatenating two results (#32510) #32520
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • Add DbContextOptions composibility support #32518
    breaking-change

Merged

  • Update Grpc.AspNetCore #32500
  • Revert behavior to throw when attempting to modify an unconstrained alternate key property #32492

Updated

  • Bump Grpc.AspNetCore from 2.45.0 to 2.59.0 #32287
    blocked, area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/8.0] Fix expression cloning when table changes in SelectExpression.VisitChildren #32504
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Cosmos: Generate ordinal values for key properties that used not to be persisted. #32489
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
